item.title: Eva add a quote by Marguerite Duras
item.description: "I've known you for years. Everyone says you were beautiful when you were young, but I want to tell you I think you're more beautiful now than then. Rather than your face as a young woman, I prefer your face as it is now. Ravaged." -- Marguerite Duras

item.title: Eva add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "We all have such fateful objects -- it may be a recurrent landscape in one case, a number in another -- carefully chosen by the gods to attract events of specific significance for us: here shall John always stumble; there shall Jane's heart always break." -- Vladimir Nabokov
